name: Gentleman Bowery

ingredients.name: Pomegranate grenadine (one part Pom Wonderful Pomegranate Juice, one part sugar)

preparation:
This tart whiskey cocktail combines orange, lemon and pomegranate flavors.

Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice.

Garnish with a lemon half-wheel.
